ai-mil7.7.3:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what is the definite of the mind?”
ai-mil7.7.3:1.2_0: “Great king, when a mind-made blands into water, he roams the water and transferred to the water. But when a bird doesn’t decline, he doesn’t lose his life.
ai-mil7.7.3:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator with his own hands to let go to the home of Bodhi, he can’t be diligent, keen, and resolute.
ai-mil7.7.3:1.4_0: And they don’t decline in the presence of quenching.
ai-mil7.7.3:1.5_0: This is the banner of the ascetic Gotama’s head.
ai-mil7.7.3:1.6_0: The Buddha has said, great king, the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.7.3:3.1_0: The fourth enquiry belonging to mind is the fourth (called):
